Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: We don't really have any direct competitors that operate in the same space that we do. Verasity provides the infrastructure to publishers to get more engagement and ROI from their videos by using our have patent pending Proof-of-view technology that ensures that viewers are only rewarded for watching the entirety of videos. We also have integrated the Verasity SDK module with Twitch, Vimeo, Flowplayer, Kaltura, JWplayer, Brightcove and Video.JS which means its easier for publishers to integrate our Rewarded Video Technology into their existing infrastructure. The Verasity token is used to power our ecosystem whereby publishers buy VRA to reward users for watching the videos.

Body: Nothing shady about it. Our official statement here:  1.  Verasity placed VRA with a market maker to support liquidity. 2. Author: Colin Memfis

Body: I slightly do not understand how you plan to deal with cheating views? nothing prevents you from running it in the background and "browse." and so 20 videos at a time

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Hi Colin,  Thanks for the question. Preventing cheating views is a core part of the Verasity Protocol's Proof of View (PoV™) technology. We're all pretty excited about what PoV™ can offer and we also have a patent pending for the technology.  The PoV™ system prevents multiple methods users may try to manipulate view counts and audience metrics such as: ● Automated repeated viewing of videos (looping views) ● Attempting to load multiple videos in parallel ● Loading videos in hidden windows/tabs ● Attempting to manipulate analytics without watching content ● Verasity or other party altering the views database  We have written quite a few pieces about PoV™ that I have linked below: - Proof of View - what's the value of a view: https://medium.com/verasity/proof-of-view-whats-the-value-of-a-view-aaea9c3d5710 - Proof of View - stamping out Fake Views & Fake News For Good: https://medium.com/verasity/proof-of-view-stamping-out-fake-views-fake-news-for-good-1eb17786e72d - How Proof of View helps Creators: https://medium.com/verasity/how-proof-of-view-pov-helps-creators-969a06c0da0e - How Proof of View helps Viewers: https://medium.com/verasity/how-proof-of-view-pov-helps-viewers-827047e6cde9 - How Proof of View helps Advertisers: https://medium.com/verasity/how-proof-of-view-pov-helps-advertisers-21821ae8c378  As for the specifics of how Proof of View (PoV™) helps stop people cheating views, the full details can be found from page 21 of our whitepaper here:  https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_whitepaper_eng.pdf  Thanks,  Verasity Team

Author: not_your_007
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: So I started looking at this project this week to see if it was worthy of investing. I did not like what I found.  On paper, the site looks pretty legit - whitepaper, docs, experienced team, all the ratings, big numbers of followers on social media accounts, links in the press on some reputable websites.  Really, the first thing that put me off is that they're registered in Cayman Islands. Dunno why, but that always smells to me.  And then one of the names in their Core Leadership team stuck out to me - Adam Simmons. I didn't know why that was familiar, so I Googled him and then it hit me - this was the guy from the car crash website that was DingitTV.  You probably won't know DingitTV unless you're into eSports (which I am) and this website was bad news. They tried to make you download a dodgy browser extension to watch video on their site which was doing god knows what. But then it came out that they are a massive ad fraud operation.  Full details on that here: https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/craigsilverman/porn-runs-the-internet  Tl;dr: This website would open pop-up ads on porn sites and run DingitTV video adverts to generate tons of cash for themselves. Not cool.  DingitTV got rebranded to Level Up Media at some point, according to press releases that came up when I searched on Google. And so I looked at the LinkedIn profiles of the people they have on their website.  They're not even trying to hide that Verasity is the same operation - all the same people involved with Level Up Media are in Verasity: Chris Gale, John Rankin, Max Gutchenko and Adam Simmons. They basically got busted on DingitTV and now they're trying to con people out of their money through Verasity. Makes me sick.  Their social media accounts are all bought bot accounts too. They have 270k+ likes on their Facebook, but none of their posts have comments and barely any likes. Where do you ever see such bad engagement? Same on their Twitter account.  This coin is bad news, people - stay away is my advice.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Hi, thanks for reaching out. I wanted to clarify a few of the points you raised in more detail.  Firstly, it is important to note that every decision we make regarding Verasity is always done in a way to balance both the long-term and short-term needs of the company, our token holders, and our users.  The sale is currently paused due to market conditions where the value of BTC and ETH has dropped substantially since the start of our sale. This has slowed the Verasity sale, as well as many other top-tier ICO’s we have been following. Investors wanting to back Verasity are out of the market until conditions improve. You can read the full details of why we paused here: https://medium.com/verasity/update-on-the-verasity-token-sale-64c750ee81fb  Although the sale is paused, our team are working hard and continuing the development and delivery of our roadmap. As we have reached our softcap, we are able to continue this development.  Regarding the token lock until Q1, this was again a difficult decision to make and we appreciate the patience and support of our token holders here. Due to the sale pause, we have had to delay our exchange listings. Despite this, we are committed to distributing purchased tokens on time. This is why we provided the ability for those who purchased VRA to get their tokens on time.  While we have distributed tokens, it was important to make sure that risks such as a secondary market forming were mitigated. Therefore, the distributed VRA will not be tradable until either VRA is live on the exchanges, or we launch our platform. Whichever of these events happens first will trigger the enablement of VRA tokens in wallets.  You can read a detailed post about why VRA is not currently tradable here: https://medium.com/verasity/heres-why-vra-tokens-aren-t-tradable-right-now-b8feab42573a  Thank you as always for your patience and understanding. The crypto-markets don’t always follow rhyme or reason but all the decisions we make are considered and for the benefit of the community and the future of Verasity as a whole.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: An absolute pleasure! Our team has been working in video distribution, online advertising, and video content for a long time now.  Can I ask what were you skeptical about?  One thing which some people pick up on is the fact that we're not doing decentralized video distribution.  There's a couple of reasons for that:  1) Decentralized video distribution works great for viral content but it's not been proven to provide a good experience for a global video library at scale. A library that will inevitably include niche videos which may never have enough users seeding to allow them to buffer properly.  2) It can be incredibly hard to take illegal content down on decentralized storage systems. We're building a platform that large media brands and AAA advertisers will want to be on and they simply won't adopt a platform that's full of copyright infringing content or terrorist videos.  3) We want to roll this product out and scale it quickly - we know we can do that using a high-powered CDN.  That's not to say we're not being pragmatic and in the future if decentralized video distribution is proven then we may start to adopt a hybrid model or move to full decentralization.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Anyone can buy a channel's VeraSparks using their VERA.  From that point on the user then owns a percentage of the channel's incoming VERA through the smart-contract. Let's say I put up 20% of my channel on the Spark Marketplace. You purchase all of that 20% in VERA. You'll then receive 20% of the incoming VERA into my channel until you sell those VeraSparks.

Author: Queregaett
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: FAQ How will Verasity manage Creator rights & moderation? Verasity will primarily empower the community to moderate itself, but there will be situations where action needs to be taken to avoid risks to the economy as a whole. When action from theplatform is required, it will be as a result of clearly defined rules to avoid any third parties manipulating the system. As Verasity enables a direct value exchange between Viewers and Creators, only clear policy violations should require platform action. Tools such as the upload limit for Creators naturally act to limit freedom given to content that is unwanted by the community. Further details on how Verasity will manage moderation to create a stable and long-term content ecosystem and economy can be found within the White Paper.

Author: Piplaimaineste
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: I was previously interested in the same question at the team. Here's the answer from Verasity.  "Here's a list of our competitive advantages:  Videos on Verasity’s system are hosted on the world’s largest CDN (Akamai) rather than using unproven decentralized video distribution technology. Right from the start users will receive the consistently high-quality experience they’ve grown accustomed to and that is essential for adoption of the platform. Verasity’s video player technology (VeraPlayer™) has distributed over 8 Petabytes of data in a month and is already embedded on leading ICO rating sites such as ICO Bench.  Decentralized blockchain — Verasity’s high-performance blockchain will provide the throughput required to support microtransactions at scale, overcome congestion, and other issues such as users forcing hard forks. Users will be able to transact directly between themselves without requiring middlemen which currently take a large percentage of value out of the ecosystem before creators even get paid. Users get to choose whether they watch advertising and if they do they'll get rewarded directly by advertisers for their time. Creators also get paid in near-real-time rather than having to wait for 60 or 90-days for payment in some cases. Verasity also includes donations, pay-per-view, monthly paid subscriptions all from within the browser.  Proof-of-View (PoV™) (Patent Pending) tech — Ensures accurate and secure audience metrics, allows for independent auditing, and tackles issues such as ad-fraud and fake/bot views which are rampant on existing platform.  Spark Marketplace — Think the next evolution of crowdfunding where users will be able to directly fund the growth of content as well as fund projects such as feature films and then receive an on-going share of the success in VERA.  Economic Model — Working with Dr. Christian Jaag (founder of the Centre for Cryptoeconomics), Verasity has commissioned one of the most extensive economic analyses ever undertaken on a crypto-economy. The model, which was created off the back of thousands of simulations and stress tests, is designed to create a stable economy with a 3% inflation rate. More information can be found at this link: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf  vDaf — a suite of online video platform products designed for international broadcasters and large media outlets. Verasity’s suite of products will allow them to use our video platform, CMS, VeraPlayer™ with integrated wallet, analytics, Proof-of-View™ technology, and last but not least our robust monetization system that allows donations, pay-per-view, monthly subscriptions, and the revolutionary Spark Marketplace.  Token Compliance — Verasity is SICOP (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) compliant meaning that Verasity is committed to conducting a safe and secure ICO, maintaining good practice and ethics. Further information is available: http://sicop.tokeny.com/verasity-tokeny-u180301"

The reason that we are pausing rather than extending is no-one knows when the market will improve, so it isn't clear how long the sale should be extended for. Because of this, a pause was the best way to balance the needs of our token holders with both the short and long-term requirements of the project.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Here's a list of our competitive advantages:  Videos on Verasity’s system are hosted on the world’s largest CDN (Akamai) rather than using unproven decentralized video distribution technology. Right from the start users will receive the consistently high-quality experience they’ve grown accustomed to and that is essential for adoption of the platform. Verasity’s video player technology (VeraPlayer™) has distributed over 8 Petabytes of data in a month and is already embedded on leading ICO rating sites such as ICO Bench.  Decentralized blockchain — Verasity’s high-performance blockchain will provide the throughput required to support microtransactions at scale, overcome congestion, and other issues such as users forcing hard forks. Users will be able to transact directly between themselves without requiring middlemen which currently take a large percentage of value out of the ecosystem before creators even get paid. Users get to choose whether they watch advertising and if they do they'll get rewarded directly by advertisers for their time. Creators also get paid in near-real-time rather than having to wait for 60 or 90-days for payment in some cases. Verasity also includes donations, pay-per-view, monthly paid subscriptions all from within the browser.  Proof-of-View (PoV™) (Patent Pending) tech — Ensures accurate and secure audience metrics, allows for independent auditing, and tackles issues such as ad-fraud and fake/bot views which are rampant on existing platform.  Spark Marketplace — Think the next evolution of crowdfunding where users will be able to directly fund the growth of content as well as fund projects such as feature films and then receive an on-going share of the success in VERA.  Economic Model — Working with Dr. Christian Jaag (founder of the Centre for Cryptoeconomics), Verasity has commissioned one of the most extensive economic analyses ever undertaken on a crypto-economy. The model, which was created off the back of thousands of simulations and stress tests, is designed to create a stable economy with a 3% inflation rate. More information can be found at this link: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf  vDaf — a suite of online video platform products designed for international broadcasters and large media outlets. Verasity’s suite of products will allow them to use our video platform, CMS, VeraPlayer™ with integrated wallet, analytics, Proof-of-View™ technology, and last but not least our robust monetization system that allows donations, pay-per-view, monthly subscriptions, and the revolutionary Spark Marketplace.  Token Compliance — Verasity is SICOP (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) compliant meaning that Verasity is committed to conducting a safe and secure ICO, maintaining good practice and ethics. Further information is available: http://sicop.tokeny.com/verasity-tokeny-u180301

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: The primary benefit for having tokens is that you can use them to reward creators for their videos whether that's through donations, unlocking videos, or doing monthly recurring paid subscriptions like on Patreon.  You'll also be able to use VERA Tokens in the Spark Marketplace and use them to purchase VeraSpark smart-contracts in a creator's channel. Whilst you hold these smart-contracts you'll be rewarded with a percentage of a creator's incoming VERA revenue until you sell them.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: If you'd like to know more here's why we've got the competitive advantage in this space: https://steemit.com/cryptocurrency/@verasitytech/verasity-the-true-next-generation-blockchain-video-platform

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: XCHNG is a revolutionary blockchain technology that centers around insertion orders (IOs, otherwise known as advertising contracts) and a verifiable ledger for the buying and selling of digital ads.  Verasity’s blockchain-enhanced Proof-of-View (PoV™) technology is the perfect complement to companies on the XCHNG platform because of its ability to dramatically reduce ad-fraud. It ensures that advertisers who book campaigns across Verasity’s ecosystem via XCHNG will receive transparent audience metrics and a dramatic reduction in ad fraud.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Any transaction in the Verasity ecosystem requires VERA (VRA) tokens. Whether that's advertisers paying viewers if they choose to watch adverts, viewers earning VERA for watching videos or viewers rewarding creators for their content.

Author: remodex9
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: The Supercharged Blockchain Powering Verasity  Traditional video sharing platforms rely on quantifying views to determine advertising pay-out. Among the many issues with this, some creators are still using bots to generate fake views. When advertising companies can’t trust if a view is real or not, they can’t trust the number of adverts claimed to be shown. As a result, brands and advertising companies are finding it hard to provide the payment that was agreed upon or simply need to pay less for slippage. Engagement data such as thumbs up, thumbs down, comments, and subscribes run recommendation engines, but these metrics are easily manipulated.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: YouTube is the largest video sharing website at the moment. However, they're locked into a fixed monetisation model and there's a lot of disenfranchisement in the creator community. Verasity will provide creators and publishers not only with the tools they need e.g. donations, pay-per-view, and monthly subscriptions all from within the player as well as giving them more flexibility so they can run their channels in the the way that makes sense for their audience.  Likewise Verasity is more than just the video sharing platform vDaf provides global publishers and media outlets with a full video-toolkit to supercharge their existing online video offering.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Even if we just take 1% of YouTube's overall market share Verasity will be doing very well indeed. We've also got vDaf which is our video toolkit for existing broadcasters and media outlets. They'll be able to use our cryptocurrency commerce system and many more modules.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Hi there you can find our channel here: https://www.youtube.com/c/Verasity

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Verasity is actually a bit different. Whilst we will have a B2C community-driven video-sharing platform like YouTube the other half of the project is our B2B offering. vDaf is our suite of modular video tools for existing broadcasters and media outlets. They'll be able to use components of our platform to supercharge their existing video offerings.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: The difference is on Verasity you are the one who is determining the worth of content by being able to reward creators directly. You mentioned YouTube - creators are paid by advertisers once YouTube has taken their cut. On Verasity we're removing the middlemen and bringing viewer and creator closer together.  Finally our Spark Marketplace allows creators to sell a portion of their channel to raise money. The viewers who buy these smart contracts then receive a cut of the channel's incoming VERA revenue until they sell those contracts.

Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Here are a list of our competitive advantages compared to Viuly, Steem, Theta etc.  1) Videos on Verasity’s system are hosted on the world’s largest CDN (Akamai) rather than using unproven decentralized video distribution technology. Right from the start users will receive the consistently high-quality experience they’ve grown accustomed to and that is essential for adoption of the platform.  2)Verasity’s video player technology (VeraPlayer™) has distributed over 8 Petabytes of data in a month and is already embedded on leading ICO rating sites such as ICO Bench.  3) Decentralized blockchain — Verasity’s high-performance blockchain will provide the throughput required to support microtransactions at scale, overcome congestion, and other issues such as users forcing hard forks.  4) Proof-of-View™ (Patent Pending) — Ensures accurate and secure audience metrics, allows for independent auditing, and tackles issues such as ad-fraud and fake/bot views.  5) Spark Marketplace — Think the next evolution of crowdfunding where users will be able to directly fund the growth of content as well as fund projects such as feature films and then receive an on-going share of the success in VERA.  6) Economic Model — Working with Dr. Christian Jaag (founder of the Centre for Cryptoeconomics), Verasity has commissioned one of the most extensive economic analyses ever undertaken on a crypto-economy. The model, which was created off the back of thousands of simulations and stress tests, is designed to create a stable economy with a 3% inflation rate. More information can be found at this link: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf  7) vDaf — a suite of online video platform products designed for international broadcasters and large media outlets. Verasity’s suite of products will allow them to use our video platform, CMS, VeraPlayer™ with integrated wallet, analytics, Proof-of-View™ technology, and last but not least our robust monetization system that allows donations, pay-per-view, monthly subscriptions, and the revolutionary Spark Marketplace.  8 ) Token Compliance — Verasity is SICOP (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) compliant meaning that Verasity is committed to conducting a safe and secure ICO, maintaining good practice and ethics. Further information is available: http://sicop.tokeny.com/verasity-tokeny-u180301

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: We want to bring fans even closer to their favourite creators. We think the Spark Marketplace is the perfect opportunity for this. Creators get to fund their channel to take the next step - whether that's growing their audience or buying new equipment. The people who support them by buying VeraSparks (smart contracts) from that point on then get a share of the channel's incoming VERA. Everyone who holds these smart contracts will be even more invested in making sure that the channel is a success so you're also creating a group of people who will become brand advocates.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: During the first 3-6 months we’ll have additional incentives for both Creators and Viewers. We’ll invite select Content Creators to participate in both the final stages of testing and the launch of the product. These Super-Creators will have additional incentives to provide content on a regular basis, and drive audience / awareness of the platform.  We’ll also be targeting Creators and content genres with demographics that have a higher propensity to be early technology adopters and future advocates. Key influencers will be targeted to upload their regular high-quality content to build out the video library. We’ll also be speaking to non-creator Influencers to grow the platform through referral sign-ups, sharing links to generate views and other incentives.  This will then take us through to the advocate stage and then finally onto mass adoption.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Here's how we'll use the funds from the token sale:  20% Research and Development - Engineering costs to implement proposed roadmap, including Blockchain Network development and platform upgrades  20% Contractors and Salaries - Includes payroll for all non engineering staff and contractors  20% Technology Licenses - Includes all licences for the underlying technology, including the player, uploader, advertising platform etc.  18% Platform Costs - Includes hosting, storage, bandwidth and delivery of content when users interact with the online video platform  17% Marketing and Content - Investment in platform usage, brand awareness, market adoption and publisher incentives to join community  2.5% Legal and Admin - Compliance and other related administrative and accounting costs  1.5% Business Development - To develop global commercial partnerships  1% Contingency - To cover any overspends in the above categories

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform

Verasity will also offer them more flexibility than on any other existing video platform thanks to the varied monetization options they can set on a per-video basis.  They'll also be able to make full use of the Verasity Spark Marketplace: https://medium.com/verasity/the-spark-marketplace-providing-the-power-to-create-e1365d4c4141

Author: ardodd
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Sorry, but here's a review from https://hacked.com/ Really good score - 7.25 out of 10  ICO Analysis: Verasity (VRA) Published on May 23, 2018 By Kent Hamilton  Verdict Verasity will use blockchain technology to finally have a transparent and reliable solution to the many problems facing the video sharing industry. Some of the key features of Verasity’s blockchain technologies are: Verasity High-Performance Blockchain, VERA Transactions, Proof of View (patent pending) and DPoS. All of the videos run off of VeraPlayer, which is a blockchain enabled video player that allows users to view content securely from many mobile and desktop devices without the need to install additional software. Verasity has partnered with Akamai, a leading global content distribution network. This enables Verasity to deliver over 8 PetaBytes of video data per month, allowing them to scale quickly. If Verasity continues to deliver on the benchmarks outlined on their roadmap, they could quickly become a major player in this highly competitive field. Risks     Although Verasity is unique with their own blockchain and PoV, it still has competition such as Steem, Basic Attention Token, Props, and Flixxo. -1.25     The hard cap is on the high side at 6,245,750,000 VRA which equates to over $46M USD. -1.5 Growth Potential     Verasity has a large and experienced team along with top-notch advisers that are capable of building and scaling the company successfully. +4     Having multiple ways to earn for creators and viewers has the potential to grow at a fast pace while their partnership with Akamai will allow for scalability. Basic Attention Token may use Verasity as its default video player. +3.5     Hype and community are important to create exposure for ICOs. Verasity has over 41k telegram members, 10k Twitter followers, and 237k Facebook followers. +2.5 Disposition Blockchain platforms are in high demand right now. Verasity is no exception. With internet traffic being worth $312 billion by 2021, online video is set to account for 82% of all traffic. Company giants such as Facebook and Google generated $191 billion in advertising revenue in 2017. Personal data has become the new commodity and Verasity aims to reward creators and content publishers. Verasity is 100% SICOP compliant (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) which defines rules and methodology to determine whether ICOs are secure, follow good practices and ethical rules. Verasity is one of the few ICOs that is completely compliant. In an ICO atmosphere riddled with scams, this gives Verasity a head start. Due to the enormous potential as a successful first mover and the fact that they have followed very strict rules to be ethically compliant, Verasity receives a rating of 7.25 out of 10. Proof: https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-verasity-vra/

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Hey, we've answered this a few times but just in case you missed it.  1) Videos on Verasity's system are hosted on the world's largest CDN (Akamai) rather than using unproven decentralized video distribution technology. This ensures that right from the start, users will receive the consistently high-quality experience they've grown accustomed to. Verasity’s video player technology has distributed over 8 Petabytes of data in a month and is already embedded on leading ICO rating sites such as ICO Bench. You can test our player out right now: https://verasity.io/player  2) Decentralized proprietary blockchain (Q3 2018) - Verasity’s high-performance proprietary blockchain will provide the throughput required to support microtransactions at scale, overcome congestion, and other issues such as users forcing hard forks.  3) Proof-of-View™ (Patent Pending) - Ensures accurate and secure audience metrics, allows for independent auditing, and tackles issues such as ad-fraud and fake/bot views.  4) Spark Marketplace - Think the next evolution of crowdfunding where users will be able to directly fund the growth of content as well as fund projects such as feature films and then receive an on-going share of the success in VERA.  5) Economic Model - Working with Dr. Christian Jaag (founder of the Centre for Cryptoeconomics), Verasity has commissioned one of the most extensive economic analyses ever undertaken on a crypto-economy. The model, which was created off the back of thousands of simulations and stress tests, is designed to create a stable economy with a 3% inflation rate. More information can be found at this link: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf  6) vDaf - a suite of online video platform products designed for international broadcasters and large media outlets. Verasity's suite of products will allow them to use our video platform, CMS, proprietary player with integrated wallet, analytics, Proof-of-View technology, and last but not least our robust monetization system that allows donations, pay-per-view, monthly subscriptions, and the revolutionary Spark Marketplace.  7) Token Compliance - Verasity is SICOP (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) compliant meaning that Verasity is committed to conducting a safe and secure ICO, maintaining good practice and ethics. Further information is available: http://sicop.tokeny.com/verasity-tokeny-u180301

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Sorry guys, thought we'd posted this for you. As always you can keep up to date with our articles here: https://medium.com/verasity  Take Your Power Back On Verasity    We realised a long time ago that not everyone wants or even needs the same things. That’s why we believe you shouldn’t be forced into using a one-size-fits-all video platform where the decisions are made on your behalf!  One of the cornerstones of Verasity is choice. Whether that’s choosing as a Viewer whether you want to watch adverts or the choice as a Creator/Publisher on how you want to monetize your video content.  That’s what you’ll get on Verasity.  It’s only been relatively recently that people around the world have realised that they’re the product and they’ve been paying for “free” services with their personal data. At Verasity we’re going to completely turn that around.  You’re going to get to choose whether you want to see adverts, how much personal data you want to share with advertisers, and even the ways in which you want to support your favourite creators.  On Verasity you get to choose whether you want to watch advertisements. If you do you’ll get paid directly for your attention by advertisers in Verasity’s cryptocurrency, VERA. You’re also going to get to decide how much information you share with advertisers or whether you want to receive targeted advertising based on that information. If you choose to receive targeted advertising and share your demographic information, you’ll get paid more when you watch advertising. On Verasity, the choice is up to you. You can keep your data to yourself or get paid by the people who want to use it in the first place!   On existing video-sharing platforms if you want to support a creator, all you can do is turn your Ad-blocker off, watch the adverts, and hope that they get the money they deserve. Verasity’s going to give you the power to choose exactly how you want to support your favourite creators. You can donate directly, with the knowledge that there are no external middlemen taking their cut first. You can unlock pay-per-view videos with VERA for an amount that the Creator themselves has set. Or you can even support them on an ongoing basis and pay for a monthly recurring subscription. All of this happens from within Verasity’s video player which is revolutionary!   We’re even going to give you the chance to get even closer to your favourite creators. The Spark Marketplace is the next evolution of crowdfunding and allows Creators to put a portion of their channel future revenue on the Spark Marketplace in the form of VeraSparks, and let their fans buy them with VERA. The people who buy them then receive a portion of that channel’s incoming VERA from that point onwards until they sell those VeraSparks.   Remember, on Verasity you get to take your power back. You get to choose whether you want to see ads, whether you want to share your data, how much data you want to share, and you also get to choose how you want to support your favourite creators.  Join our community: If you want to join the conversation about Verasity then please follow our various accounts below!  Website: https://verasity.io  Telegram: http://t.me/verasitychat  Twitter: https://twitter.com/verasitytech  Facebook: https://facebook.com/verasitytech  LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/verasity

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Compared to similar projects such as BitTube, Verasity has more than a few distinguishing factors:  1) Videos on Verasity's system are hosted on the world's largest CDN (Akamai) rather than using unproven decentralized video distribution technology. This ensures that right from the start, users will receive the consistently high-quality experience they've grown accustomed to. Verasity’s video player technology has distributed over 8 Petabytes of data in a month and is already embedded on leading ICO rating sites such as ICO Bench. You can test our player out right now: https://verasity.io/player  It's also worth noting that Verasity is a video platform that's going to have high-quality premium content on it from global broadcasters and media outlets. These publishers will never be on decentralized platforms such as BitTube as they simply won't put their content on platforms that are full of copyright infringing material and illegal content which can't be removed.  2) Decentralized proprietary blockchain - Verasity’s high-performance proprietary blockchain will provide the throughput required to support microtransactions at scale, overcome congestion, and other issues such as users forcing hard forks.  3) Proof-of-View™ (Patent Pending) - Ensures accurate and secure audience metrics, allows for independent auditing, and tackles issues such as ad-fraud and fake/bot views.  4) Spark Marketplace - Think the next evolution of crowdfunding where users will be able to directly fund the growth of content as well as fund projects such as feature films and then receive an on-going share of the success in VERA.  5) Economic Model - Working with Dr. Christian Jaag (founder of the Centre for Cryptoeconomics), Verasity has commissioned one of the most extensive economic analyses ever undertaken on a crypto-economy. The model, which was created off the back of thousands of simulations and stress tests, is designed to create a stable economy with a 3% inflation rate. More information can be found at this link: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf  6) vDaf - a suite of online video platform products designed for international broadcasters and large media outlets. Verasity's suite of products will allow them to use our video platform, CMS, proprietary player with integrated wallet, analytics, Proof-of-View technology, and last but not least our robust monetization system that allows donations, pay-per-view, monthly subscriptions, and the revolutionary Spark Marketplace.  7) Token Compliance - Verasity is SICOP (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) compliant meaning that Verasity is committed to conducting a safe and secure ICO, maintaining good practice and ethics. Further information is available: http://sicop.tokeny.com/verasity-tokeny-u180301

Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform

In terms of copyright control, Verasity will be a place for high-quality video content and a home for international broadcasters and media titans alongside incredible Vloggers and other Creators. We're going to take a Reddit style moderation approach but illegal content and uploading copyrighted material that you don't have the rights too won't be allowed.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: We do have additional rewards for users but it's not for keeping VERA in their desktop wallet. Users will be able to purchase something called TotalSparks with their VERA. A TotalSpark entitles the owner to a portion of the Verasity Foundation commercial transaction pool. This is paid out in VERA proportional to the size of TotalSpark held on a daily basis for as long as the user holds the TotalSpark.  You can find out more info about this and TotalSpark expiry dates in our whitepaper on page 35/36: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_whitepaper_eng.pdf

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Verasity isn't going to be a platform where people can upload copyrighted videos such as films or TV Shows - it's going to be a platform for high-quality content uploaded by those who own it.  This is important as it'll give us the legitimacy to have global broadcasters on Verasity and ensure that Verasity's reputation doesn't get tarnished for being full of illegal content.  Users may receive rewards for uploading content as an incentive from the Verasity Foundation to move over onto the platform but on an on-going basis, creators will get paid by their fans via optional donations, paid recurring subscriptions, or unlocking pay-per-view videos at a price that the creator sets.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Thank you very much!

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: On traditional video platforms creators earn a slice of the advertising revenue paid to the platforms by advertisers.  On Verasity advertisers will pay viewers if they choose to switch ads on. They will then pay creators directly in the form of optional donations, to unlock pay-per-view videos, recurring monthly subscriptions etc.  This is a far better model as viewers are the ones who are valuing the content not advertisers, who currently value it based on what the demographic makeup of someone's audience looks like.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Compared to similar projects, Verasity has more than a few distinguishing factors:  1) Videos on Verasity's system are hosted on the world's largest CDN (Akamai) rather than using unproven decentralized video distribution technology. This ensures that right from the start, users will receive the consistently high-quality experience they've grown accustomed to. Verasity’s video player technology has distributed over 8 Petabytes of data in a month and is already embedded on leading ICO rating sites such as ICO Bench. You can test our player out right now: https://verasity.io/player  2) Decentralized proprietary blockchain (Q3 2018) - Verasity’s high-performance proprietary blockchain will provide the throughput required to support microtransactions at scale, overcome congestion, and other issues such as users forcing hard forks.  3) Proof-of-View™ (Patent Pending) - Ensures accurate and secure audience metrics, allows for independent auditing, and tackles issues such as ad-fraud and fake/bot views.  4) Spark Marketplace - Think the next evolution of crowdfunding where users will be able to directly fund the growth of content as well as fund projects such as feature films and then receive an on-going share of the success in VERA.  5) Economic Model - Working with Dr. Christian Jaag (founder of the Centre for Cryptoeconomics), Verasity has commissioned one of the most extensive economic analyses ever undertaken on a crypto-economy. The model, which was created off the back of thousands of simulations and stress tests, is designed to create a stable economy with a 3% inflation rate. More information can be found at this link: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf  6) vDaf - a suite of online video platform products designed for international broadcasters and large media outlets. Verasity's suite of products will allow them to use our video platform, CMS, proprietary player with integrated wallet, analytics, Proof-of-View technology, and last but not least our robust monetization system that allows donations, pay-per-view, monthly subscriptions, and the revolutionary Spark Marketplace.  7) Token Compliance - Verasity is SICOP (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) compliant meaning that Verasity is committed to conducting a safe and secure ICO, maintaining good practice and ethics. Further information is available: http://sicop.tokeny.com/verasity-tokeny-u180301  So as you can see there are aspects of the project that are completely unique.  Minimum investment is around $100 at the moment. The price of VERA increases by 1% each day so the earlier you get in the better price you will get.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: On Verasity Viewers get to choose whether they want to watch adverts or not. If you choose to watch them you'll get paid directly be advertisers for your time.  In fact, choice is a big theme that runs throughout Verasity. You'll also get to choose how much of your demographic data you wish to share with advertisers and whether you want to let them target you with advertising based on your interests. If you want to allow them to have more of your demographic data you'll be rewarded more.  We'll also have incentives for people to share and watch videos - we'll go into more detail about this the closer we get to launch!

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Whilst Verasity will have a video-sharing platform like YouTube we've also got vDaf which is a suite of online video platform products designed for international broadcasters and large media outlets.  These are media companies who have a lot of video content yet aren't able to monetize it well at the moment. Verasity's suite of products will allow them to use our video platform, CMS, proprietary player with integrated wallet, analytics, Proof-of-View technology, and last but not least our robust monetization system that allows donations, pay-per-view, monthly subscriptions, and the revolutionary Spark Marketplace.  It's also worth noting that unlike some projects, which are doing decentralized video distribution, we're partnering with Akamai (the world's largest CDN). By centralizing our video distribution we're able to make sure that you'll get the high-quality video experience you expect without buffering.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Take Your Power Back On Verasity  We realised a long time ago that not everyone wants or even needs the same things. That’s why we believe you shouldn’t be forced into using a one-size-fits-all video platform where the decisions are made on your behalf!  One of the cornerstones of Verasity is choice. Whether that's choosing as a Viewer whether you want to watch adverts or the choice as a Creator/Publisher on how you want to monetize your video content. That’s what you’ll get on Verasity.  It’s only been relatively recently that people around the world have realised that they're the product and they’ve been paying for "free" services with their personal data. At Verasity we’re going to completely turn that around. You’re going to get to choose whether you want to see adverts, how much personal data you want to share with advertisers, and even the ways in which you want to support your favourite creators.  On Verasity you get to choose whether you want to watch advertisements. If you do you’ll get paid directly for your attention by advertisers in Verasity’s cryptocurrency, VERA. You’re also going to get to decide how much information you share with advertisers or whether you want to receive targeted advertising based on that information. If you choose to receive targeted advertising and share your demographic information, you’ll get paid more when you watch advertising. On Verasity, the choice is up to you. You can keep your data to yourself or get paid by the people who want to use it in the first place!   On existing video-sharing platforms if you want to support a creator, all you can do is turn your Ad-blocker off, watch the adverts, and hope that they get the money they deserve. Verasity’s going to give you the power to choose exactly how you want to support your favourite creators. You can donate directly, with the knowledge that there are no external middlemen taking their cut first. You can unlock pay-per-view videos with VERA for an amount that the Creator themselves has set. Or you can even support them on an ongoing basis and pay for a monthly recurring subscription. All of this happens from within Verasity’s video player which is revolutionary!   We’re even going to give you the chance to get even closer to your favourite creators. The Spark Marketplace is the next evolution of crowdfunding and allows Creators to put a portion of their channel future revenue on the Spark Marketplace in the form of VeraSparks, and let their fans buy them with VERA. The people who buy them then receive a portion of that channel’s incoming VERA from that point onwards until they sell those VeraSparks.   Remember, on Verasity you get to take your power back. You get to choose whether you want to see ads, whether you want to share your data, how much data you want to share, and you also get to choose how you want to support your favourite creators.   Find out below how to join the online video revolution today!  How To Buy VERA Tokens  The Verasity Token Sale is now live! Each day the price of VERA will increase by 1% so make sure you jump in and get it at the best price possible!  → https://verasity.io/sale/sign-up ←  Join our community: If you want to join the conversation about Verasity then please follow our various accounts below!  Website: https://verasity.io Telegram: http://t.me/verasitychat Twitter: https://twitter.com/verasitytech Facebook: https://facebook.com/verasitytech LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/verasity Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/verasity

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Thanks for the question, Verasity's video-sharing platform will complete against YouTube and Facebook's video services however our go-to-market strategy is robust and we know that once Creators see how much more they could be earning on Verasity adoption will ramp up quickly. That's before you get to the fact that we provide more choice than existing video platforms and don't force creators into a one-size-fits-all model.  Verasity isn't just a video-sharing platform though, our vDaf protocol will allow media businesses around the world to see better returns on their video content through our infrastructure. You can find out more about that here: https://medium.com/verasity/introducing-vdaf-verasity-decentralized-application-framework-5b5757777ae2  We'll have a lot more info coming on vDaf in the coming weeks!

Author: PchelkaMaja95
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Will the video be moderated? How are you going to deal with inappropriate content? Will they be moderated or will this happen automatically?

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Whilst most of the technology around Verasity is decentralized, our video distribution isn't - it will be delivered by a high-performance CDN. This means that content can be taken down. Verasity is going to adopt more of a Reddit style moderation approach, however illegal content will still be removed.  This is important as it means that the whole platform won't be blacklisted by advertisers or have its brand tarnished.  Initially moderation will be handled in-house but we have plans to move it out into the community over time with incentives so the community will police the community.

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Compared to similar projects, Verasity has more than a few distinguishing factors:  Videos on Verasity system are hosted on a high-performance CDN rather than using unproven decentralized video distribution technology. This ensures that right from the start, users will receive a consistently high-quality experience. Verasity’s video player technology has distributed over 8 Petabytes of data in a month and is already embedded on leading ICO rating sites such as ICO Bench.  Verasity doesn't force a one size fits all model so creators can choose how to monetize their videos e.g. Donations, pay per view, monthly subscriptions etc.  Viewers choose whether they want to watch advertising - if they do they get rewarded directly from advertisers.  Decentralized proprietary blockchain (Q3 2018) - Verasity’s high-performance proprietary blockchain will provide the throughput required to support microtransactions at scale, overcome congestion, and other issues such as users forcing hard forks.  Proof-of-View™ (Patent Pending) - Ensures accurate and secure audience metrics, allows for independent auditing, and tackles issues such as ad-fraud and fake/bot views.  Spark Marketplace - Think the next evolution of crowdfunding where users will be able to directly fund the growth of content as well as fund projects such as feature films and then receive an on-going share of the success in VERA.  Economic Model - Working with Dr. Christian Jaag (founder of the Centre for Cryptoeconomics), Verasity has commissioned one of the most extensive economic analyses ever undertaken on a crypto-economy. The model, which was created off the back of thousands of simulations and stress tests, is designed to create a stable economy with a 3% inflation rate. More information can be found at this link.   Token Compliance - Verasity is SICOP (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) compliant meaning that Verasity is committed to conducting a safe and secure ICO, maintaining good practice and ethics. Further information is available here.

Author: fiubit
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: ICO Analysis: Verasity (VRA) Published on May 23, 2018 By Kent Hamilton  Verdict Verasity will use blockchain technology to finally have a transparent and reliable solution to the many problems facing the video sharing industry. Some of the key features of Verasity’s blockchain technologies are: Verasity High-Performance Blockchain, VERA Transactions, Proof of View (patent pending) and DPoS. All of the videos run off of VeraPlayer, which is a blockchain enabled video player that allows users to view content securely from many mobile and desktop devices without the need to install additional software. Verasity has partnered with Akamai, a leading global content distribution network. This enables Verasity to deliver over 8 PetaBytes of video data per month, allowing them to scale quickly. If Verasity continues to deliver on the benchmarks outlined on their roadmap, they could quickly become a major player in this highly competitive field. Risks     Although Verasity is unique with their own blockchain and PoV, it still has competition such as Steem, Basic Attention Token, Props, and Flixxo. -1.25     The hard cap is on the high side at 6,245,750,000 VRA which equates to over $46M USD. -1.5  Growth Potential     Verasity has a large and experienced team along with top-notch advisers that are capable of building and scaling the company successfully. +4     Having multiple ways to earn for creators and viewers has the potential to grow at a fast pace while their partnership with Akamai will allow for scalability. Basic Attention Token may use Verasity as its default video player. +3.5     Hype and community are important to create exposure for ICOs. Verasity has over 41k telegram members, 10k Twitter followers, and 237k Facebook followers. +2.5  Disposition Blockchain platforms are in high demand right now. Verasity is no exception. With internet traffic being worth $312 billion by 2021, online video is set to account for 82% of all traffic. Company giants such as Facebook and Google generated $191 billion in advertising revenue in 2017. Personal data has become the new commodity and Verasity aims to reward creators and content publishers. Verasity is 100% SICOP compliant (Sustainable ICOs Protocol) which defines rules and methodology to determine whether ICOs are secure, follow good practices and ethical rules. Verasity is one of the few ICOs that is completely compliant. In an ICO atmosphere riddled with scams, this gives Verasity a head start. Due to the enormous potential as a successful first mover and the fact that they have followed very strict rules to be ethically compliant, Verasity receives a rating of 7.25 out of 10. Proof: https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-verasity-vra/  This  is a very good result!

Author: TheCraMan
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Verasity is using an ERC-20 token as a placeholder for the actual Vera coin, which is still in development. The company will release its own blockchain using a delegated proof of stake consensus. The Vera coin will be released at the end of 2018, along with both desktop and web-based wallets, and will directly replace the ERC-20 tokens. It does not mention any listing on public exchanges. The company provides little information about its initial private sale; neither its website nor any of its published papers mention the start date, discounts, or amount being sold, but it is certain that it will end on April 30, 2018. An open pre-sale will run through May, and then the full ICO will run during June. A total of 12,491,500,000 ERC-20 tokens will be created; 12% will be sold during the pre-sale for $0.00750 apiece, and 10% will be sold during the public sale for $0.001. Investors participating in either sale must spend between $1,000 and $50,000, and the sale is closed to buyers from the U.S., Saudi Arabia, and a few other countries.

Author: johnleema

Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: The platform will involve a blockchain employing delegated Proof-of-Stake and smart contracts.   Verasity incorporates the following elements:  1) Next Generation Video Player. The player uses QUIC (Quick UDP Internet Connections), Transport Layer Security(TLS) and User Datagram Protocol (UDP) to reduce buffering and increase video resolution. Specifications are as follows:  HTML5 player. Vast 3 and VPAID support. Vera Wallet integrated access and interface. Can operate both with and without Google IMA SDK. Mobile screen adaptable. Author: TheCraMan
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: The Spark Marketplace: Providing The Power To Create  The Spark Marketplace is designed to help Creators of all types. Whether you’re broadcasting from your home setup, have a production studio, or you’re a major media producer — you all have one thing in common. In order to Create, you need funds.  Creators constantly need to generate revenue. It’s what they rely upon to pay the bills, live, and yes, continue making videos!  At the moment it’s difficult to rely upon Content Creation as the sole source of income. Unclear revenue share models and the oversaturation of current platforms make it a constant uphill climb for Creators who are struggling to survive. That’s not all they have to deal with though, the top videos that users see are the ones which make the platforms the most money — not necessarily what’s best for the Viewer or Creator. It’s a constant battle that unfortunately most Creators are losing. Did you know that the majority of Creators are living below the poverty line?  It’s not just daily living, great content needs investment in both time and money. This can be anything from a new camera, to a bigger studio, or paying celebrities to star in videos. Without more content, and better content, audiences may become unengaged and look elsewhere for something to watch. As most Creators know, higher quality videos equals more subscribers, donations, and sponsorships but a huge amount both time and money are required to get there!  Read more here!!  https://medium.com/verasity/the-spark-marketplace-providing-the-power-to-create-e1365d4c4141

Author: TheCraMan
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: NOW ONLY ON PAY-PER-VIEW  Here is something for you to think about. When your hear “ONLY ON PAY-Per-VIEW” what do you think? Wow I really want to see that? Man this cost too much? Pay-Per-View is associated with many of the greats, MMA, Boxing, Wrestling, Movies… You could be watching all of these on Verasity in the future! Verasity’s blockchain-enabled video sharing platform brings video creators and viewers together. It’s also going to solve many of the problems that exist with online video today. Verasity’s platform/economy runs on VERA coins which viewers send directly to their favourite creators and video publishers. As a viewer, you’ll be able to pay for premium pay-per-view video content using Verasity’s cryptocurrency, VERA. You’ll be able to send VERA directly from within the video player itself. Creators will be able to set different prices for difference videos. For example one might cost 10 VERA, another might be 50 VERA. It’s entirely down to the viewers and creators to decide what content is worth on Verasity.   Read more here: https://medium.com/verasity/redefining-pay-per-view-video-on-verasity-c581c234acbe

Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform

There are millions of videos out there from smaller creators which are hyper-valuable but never get seen amongst an ocean of fail videos and talking dogs. At Verasity we believe that if you create great content, useful content, it should be surfaced, and you should be able to make a living from it. On our platform we’re going to give Creators more flexibility as to how they want to monetize their content — the one-size-fits-all model of traditional platforms will be a thing of the past.

Author: TheCraMan
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: What is a accredited U.S. investor?  United States Accredited investor  In the United States, to be considered an accredited investor, one must have a net worth of at least $1,000,000, excluding the value of one's primary residence, or have income at least $200,000 each year for the last two years (or $300,000 combined income if married) and have the expectation to make the same amount this year. The term "accredited investor" is defined in Rule 501 of Regulation D of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as: 1.   a bank, insurance company, registered investment company, business development company, or small business investment company; 2.   an employee benefit plan, within the meaning of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act, if a bank, insurance company, or registered investment adviser makes the investment decisions, or if the plan has total assets in excess of $5 million; 3.   a charitable organization, corporation, or partnership with assets exceeding $5 million; 4.   a director, executive officer, or general partner of the company selling the securities; 5.   a business in which all the equity owners are accredited investors; 6.   a natural person who has individual net worth, or joint net worth with the person's spouse, that exceeds $1 million at the time of the purchase, or has assets under management of $1 million or above, excluding the value of the individual's primary residence;[11][12] 7.   a natural person with income exceeding $200,000 in each of the two most recent years or joint income with a spouse exceeding $300,000 for those years and a reasonable expectation of the same income level in the current year;[13] or 8.   a trust with assets in excess of $5 million, not formed to acquire the securities offered, whose purchases a sophisticated person makes.  Can U.S. Citizens Participate In Verasity’s Token Sale And Airdrop?  https://medium.com/verasity/can-u-s-citizens-participate-in-verasitys-token-sale-and-airdrop-aed9d5a567ea

Author: eren0x
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Verasity is a disruptive video sharing platform designed to pivot the online video ecosystem by enabling a direct and transparent relationship between viewers, content creators and advertisers. Our experienced team has a wealth of experience spanning across the Media and Technology sectors, with previous leadership roles at companies including Eurosport, Sky, Joost, AOL, Turner and Guardian. Powered by existing cutting-edge video player technology, Verasity provides a high-quality viewing experience. Verasity’s proprietary Blockchain technology (PoV™) creates a transparent economy powered by a new cryptocurrency called VERA. Our goal is to liberate creators and online publishers whilst improving the viewer experience for video. Verasity's protocols will be used across the web integrating video delivery and instant micropayments using VERA all backed with trusted and transparent Proof of View™ Blockchain technology.

Author: shogun47
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: There are some video sharing platforms in the making and some of them want to neglect censorship-resistance. How about your platform? Can anybody post anything or will there be mechanisms to remove illegal content or to block it fully from being published?

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Thanks for the great question. In short, our moderation policy will be as minimal as possible while still ensuring that content is legal. The primary reason for this is that if we were to openly allow the distribution of illegal content, the future of the platform would be put at significant risk from legal action being taken against us and also access to the platform being restricted by certain geo's, ISPs etc.  What is important to note is that with Verasity is that the way content is monetized helps the platform to resist any form of bias or monetization censorship. In a traditional advertising funded model, advertisers are only willing to pay for impressions on "brand safe" content. This means that more controversial content (even it is legal) is harder / impossible to monetize. As a result, this content is often not successful. On Verasity, the monetization of the content is direct - the viewers pay content creators for content. The content creator can decide on the monetization model they want to use on a video by video basis with options including donations, pay-per-view and subscriptions. This means the success of content is controlled by the viewer and creator, rather than the opinion of another third party such as an advertiser.  We also have patent-pending technology, Proof-of-View, that makes sure that all audience data is real. This makes the content recommendation and content surfacing systems resistant to bots, fake views and other methods often used to boost the stats of content to manipulate these systems (often used in "fake news"). Combined with direction interaction between viewers and creators, this creates a platform where content is surfaced based on it's value to users rather than the value to corporations or other third party's.  If you want to read more about how we will handle moderation, our Whitepaper goes into more detail on page 18 - https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_whitepaper_eng.pdf  Verasity Team

Author: aaa10247
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: WEBSITE | TWITTER | FACEBOOK  | TELEGRAM | WHITEPAPER | MEDIUM | REDDIT    Verasity Token Sale  The token sale is paused.  See here for more information.     Token Distribution  Verasity is targeting a 6,245,750,000 (50%) VERA hard cap (between private and public sale).  Soft Cap 400,000,000 VERA  Price (USD) $0.00750 and increasing by 1% per 24 hours (paid in ETH or BTC)  There will be 12,491,500,000 total VERA in the supply, broken down as follows: 7.5% Advisors, 2.5% Referral Program, 1% Stabilization Fund, 20% Team, 19% Foundation, 50% Community Investors  Take part in the Verasity 40 Million Token Airdrop (first 100,000 people!)    About Verasity  A next-generation video sharing platform.  What Is Verasity? Verasity is a disruptive next-generation video-sharing platform. Taking the best elements from traditional models such as advertising, subscription video on-demand, and crowdfunding, Verasity’s decentralized blockchain takes intermediaries out of the equation and keeps value within the community.  Verasity is designed to liberate Creators and benefit Viewers.   What Problems Does Verasity Solve? Today, Creators struggle to effectively monetize their content on video platforms. There is widespread public disenchantment with online video advertising and viewers are reluctant to watch ads.  ‘Fake views’ and ad fraud are also a pressing concern. With zero transparency of audience metrics, the value of content is skewed. And without a true value for content; brand pricing, content monetization and recommendation engine data is flawed.  See whitepaper for more.     How Verasity Works  Powered by cutting-edge video player technology that has been proven to scale to 8 PetaBytes of video data per month, Verasity’s video sharing platform provides a high-quality viewing experience.  The Verasity VeraPlayer features an integrated digital wallet that enables seamless microtransactions directly between Viewers and Creators using VERA Tokens. Within Verasity’s ecosystem, Viewers are rewarded for watching and sharing content in VERA.  If Viewers choose to watch ads they will earn more and be paid directly by advertisers. Creators are rewarded directly by Viewers with donations, and pay to unlock videos (pay-per-view) or paid subscriptions. On Verasity, Creators can choose how they want to monetize or demonetize individual videos. They decide what is right for their audience rather than having to adopt a one-size-fits-all model.    Verasity’s patent pending Proof of View (PoV) technology aims to detect fake views, bots and the manipulation of audience metrics. PoV ensures that only real views are counted and that all recommendations, content surfacing, and advertising metrics are accurate. On Verasity views have real value.   Finally, creators can use the innovative ‘Spark Marketplace’ to accelerate channel growth. The users who buy and hold ‘VeraSparks’ then receive a share of a channel’s on-going success in VERA Tokens.        Roadmap & Timeline       Team         Partnerships       Social Media Communities  Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/verasitytech/  Twitter - https://twitter.com/verasitytech  Telegram - https://t.me/verasitychat  Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/company/verasity/  Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/Verasity/  Medium - https://medium.com/verasity  Steemit - https://steemit.com/@verasitytech  Link to Website - https://verasity.io/  Link to Bounty - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3736175.msg36961868#msg36961868  Join Airdrop - https://verasity.io/airdrop  Priority Registration - https://verasity-join-whitelist.paperform.co/  Link to Whitepaper : https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_whitepaper_eng.pdf

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Thank you to everyone for your comments so far. We will endeavor to reply to comments here quickly and share updates about Verasity. You can also get the latest information from our telegram channel (already over 12k members in 10 days) and by signing up to our mailing list.     The Verasity Foundation is registered in the Cayman Islands.  Quote from: wenxop on March 29, 2018, 02:30:31 PM they have some bounty campaign   We will be announcing our bounty and referral program shortly! Stay tuned  Quote from: Gix on March 28, 2018, 06:21:24 PM I think I saw something like this already.  Are you guys copy each other?    There are a few key differences between Verasity and other projects. A lot of the details are within our Whitepaper, but here are some of the top line differences:  Verasity is built upon our existing video platform. Our video technology is already used by third parties to deliver over 8 Petabytes of data per month! You can try out our player and proof of concept VeraWallet that is built into the player here: https://verasity.io/?veraplayer. Our video delivery uses media acceleration efficiency, QUIC and other optimizations that enable a great viewing experience while remaining cost-effective. We believe that a great viewing experience on a global basis is essential the adoption of any video service. We do not utilize peer-to-per video distribution. Our team has developed patent-pending Proof-of-View (PoV) technology to verify that all views on our platform are real. This has many benefits for all users such as making recommendations more accurate, higher advertising revenue and preventing fake views from distorting the true value of content. To help video creators fund their growth, we are launching the Spark Marketplace. This allows creators to sell a part of their future earnings for VERA in the form of VeraSparks. Users who buy these VeraSparks then receive a percentage of that channels future earnings, can re-sell the VeraSpark on the marketplace and can earn rewards for holding VeraSparks for longer periods of time. For Creators, this gives a way to fund growth in everything from new camera equipment all the way up to feature films! The token economics of the VERA economy have been thoroughly tested by a team of economists. You can read the full economics report on our website here: https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf. Across our team we have a wealth of experience in online-video, video publishing, technology, blockchain and business. Our 25 strong team have a proven track record working with major companies (Turner Media, Eurosport, Sky, Akamai) over many years. The core team of Verasity has been working together for over 4 years.  If you have any other questions about Verasity, feel free to ask here and one of our team will get back to you!

Author: verasity
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Thank you for your comment.  Versasity is fundamentally changing the dynamic of the relationships in the content ecosystem. In traditional media ecosystems the Advertisers have a heavy hand in the content moderation policy. That is not the case in the Verasity ecosystem since advertising is directly associated with the Viewer’s time, and disassociated with the Viewers’ content. This removes many of the issues with traditional models where content or advertising appears to be “censored” due to a complex moderation policy. Verasity is then able to focus on the consumer experience first, getting the right content to the right Consumer.  Content Moderation is a very sensitive topic for any video ecosystem, and requires a balance of consumer protection, legal, and economic consideration. When evaluating the degree of moderation and the rules regarding what content can be uploaded to the platform, Verasity’s goal is to protect the economy, ecosystem and community as a whole while minimising the amount of moderation.  Moderation throughout the ecosystem will be initially undertaken by a team of Verasity administrators, with users able to report issues with content. Over time, we will gradually involve the community in the moderation process to effectively scale the platform, maintain an impartial perspective, and allow the economy and ecosystem to become more self-sufficient. This will include rewards for users who accurately report content and the creation of User Moderators in the future.  Verasity content moderation rules will include: Must be legal in the geographies it can be viewed in Cannot encourage or incite violence or hate speech Cannot contain or encourage harassment of specific individuals or groups Cannot impersonate someone in a misleading or deceptive manner Cannot contain personal and confidential information Content that is only suitable for adult viewers must be flagged as such Must comply with copyright and other content sharing laws  Please let me know if you have any more questions.  Verasity Team (Adam)

Author: the_hillman
Title: [ANN][ICO]Verasity - A next-generation video sharing platform
Body: Thank you! We believe the future is going to be very bright for Verasity.  We've got an established team with decades of experience working in video distribution, ad-tech, media and publishing. The team have held leadership positions before in companies such as Eurosport, Akamai, Diagonal View, AOL, Turner, Guardian Media Group etc  Established tech and a video player that has already been tested at scale up to 8 PetaBytes of data in a month.  Extensive legal due diligence has been done. Verasity is also one of the few companies to have SICOP compliance for our token sale: http://sicop.tokeny.com/verasity-tokeny-u180301  Our player is already live - you can try it for yourself today: https://verasity.io/?veraplayer  Our economy has been stress tested by cryptecon (center for cryptoeconomics): https://verasity.io/documents/verasity_economics_eng.pdf  We’re not doing P2P video distribution. CDN delivery is far more reliable and safeguards Verasity from copyright infringement which will cause advertisers to block P2P video networks wholesale  We have patent-pending Proof-of-View technology that tackles fake bot views. Our technology will combat ad-fraud, level the playing field for content creators, and improve content recommendation for viewers  Verasity’s Spark Marketplace allows viewers and users to buy smart contracts in creator channels - they then receive a share on a creator’s on-going success.  Verasity is building a proprietary blockchain based on the Graphene framework that can support 100,000 transactions per second. This gives us more control over our platform and ecosystem than those building on blockchains such as Ethereum  Viewers choose whether they want to watch advertising and if they do they'll get paid directly by advertisers for their attention  Verasity will have more unified monetization options for creators than any other existing video sharing platform at present
